user_query: I'm a food enthusiast and I'm looking for new recipes to try. Can you recommend some delicious recipes using specific ingredients like avocado and quinoa? I also need information on the nutritional value of these ingredients. Additionally, I want to analyze user behavior on my food blog. Can you assist me in generating a heatmap for my website?

TaskList.description: Get recipe suggestions using ingredients like avocado and quinoa.
Fetch nutritional information for avocado and quinoa.
Generate a heatmap analysis of user behavior on the food blog.
